text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
ClinicalDocument 1..1USRealmHeader
templateId 0..*(Slice Definition)Slice: Unordered, Open by value:root, value:extension
templateId:templateId1 I1..1IItemplateId
1198-32944: When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA 2.1 section and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 **SHALL** include both the C-CDA 2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32944).
root:templateId1 1..1root
Required Pattern: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.10
extension:templateId1 1..1extension
Required Pattern: 2015-08-01
recordTarget 1..*CDAR2.RecordTargetrecordTarget
patientRole 1..1patientRole
id 1..*id
custodian 1..1CDAR2.Custodiancustodian
assignedCustodian 1..1assignedCustodian
representedCustodianOrganization 1..1representedCustodianOrganization
component 1..1CDAR2.Component2component
nonXMLBody 1..1nonXMLBody
text I1..1text
1198-7624: If the text element does not contain a reference element with a value attribute, then it **SHALL** contain exactly one [1..1] @representation="B64" and exactly one [1..1] @mediaType (CONF:1198-7624).
1198-7623: The value of @mediaType, if present, **SHALL** be drawn from the value set 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.7.1 SupportedFileFormats STATIC 2010-05-12 (CONF:1198-7623).

Documentation for this format

name: UnstructuredDocument
title: Unstructured Document (V3)
description:
An Unstructured Document (UD) document type can (1) include unstructured content, such as a graphic, directly in a text element with a mediaType attribute, or (2) reference a single document file, such as a word-processing document using a text/reference element.
For guidance on how to handle multiple files, on the selection of media types for this IG, and on the identification of external files, see the examples that follow the constraints below.
IHEs XDS-SD (Cross-Transaction Specifications and Content Specifications, Scanned Documents Module) profile addresses a similar, more restricted use case, specifically for scanned documents or documents electronically created from existing text sources, and limits content to PDF-A or text. This Unstructured Documents template is applicable not only for scanned documents in non-PDF formats, but also for clinical documents produced through word processing applications, etc. 
For conformance with both specifications, implementers need to ensure that their documents at a minimum conform with the SHALL constraints from either specification.

element.definition: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode="US" (CONF:1198-16791).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:1198-5361).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-7710) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-7710) such that it

constraint.human: When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA 2.1 section and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 **SHALL** include both the C-CDA 2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32944).

element.definition: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1198-5363).

constraint.human: This id **SHALL** be a globally unique identifier for the document (CONF:1198-9991).

element.definition: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-5253).

constraint.human: This code **SHALL** specify the particular kind of document (e.g., History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note) (CONF:1198-9992).
This code **SHALL** be drawn from the LOINC document type ontology (LOINC codes where SCALE = DOC) (CONF:1198-32948).

element.label: The title can either be a locally defined name or the displayName corresponding to clinicalDocument/code
element.short: The title can either be a locally defined name or the displayName corresponding to clinicalDocument/code
element.definition: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-5254).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:1198-5256).

constraint.human: If more precise than day, **SHOULD** include time-zone offset (CONF:81-10130).

element.definition: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet HL7 BasicConfidentialityKind urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16926 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5259).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5372).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:1198-5261).

constraint.human: If  setId is present versionNumber **SHALL** be present (CONF:1198-6380).

element.definition: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:1198-5264).

constraint.human: If versionNumber is present setId **SHALL** be present (CONF:1198-6387).

element.definition: SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:1198-31089).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:1198-5444).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:1198-5441).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:1198-31355) such that it
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:1198-8001) such that it
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant (CONF:1198-31355) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:1198-31096).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:1198-5565).
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:1198-5579).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:1198-5607) such that it
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:1198-5607) such that it
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1198-10003) such that it
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1198-10003) such that it

constraint.human: When participant/@typeCode is *IND*, associatedEntity/@classCode **SHOULD** be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 INDRoleclassCodes *STATIC 2011-09-30* (CONF:1198-10007).

element.definition: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:1198-9952).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf (CONF:1198-14835).
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization (CONF:1198-16792) such that it
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization (CONF:1198-16792) such that it
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf (CONF:1198-9955).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-31085).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-7710) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1198-7710) such that it

constraint.human: When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA 2.1 section and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 **SHALL** include both the C-CDA 2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32944).

element.definition: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01" (CONF:1198-32522).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:1198-31089).
Such recordTargets SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole (CONF:1198-31090).
This patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-31091).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:1198-31096).
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian (CONF:1198-31097).
This assignedCustodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization (CONF:1198-31098).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-31085).
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] nonXMLBody (CONF:1198-31086).
This nonXMLBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-31087).

constraint.human: If the text element does not contain a reference element with a value attribute, then it **SHALL** contain exactly one [1..1] @representation="B64" and exactly one [1..1] @mediaType (CONF:1198-7624).
The value of @mediaType, if present, **SHALL** be drawn from the value set 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.7.1 SupportedFileFormats STATIC 2010-05-12 (CONF:1198-7623).
